WRITING.TITLE: A question on upgrade packs
WRITING.TEXT: I'm new to 40k and looking at starting a space marine army. I keep seeing upgrade packs for various chapters, what are these and how would I use them if I decided to buy one? Edit: Does 40k have an alliance system like AoS? I.e if I had an army of space wolves could I perhaps throw an imperial knight in there?
Current score is 50,050. Since the addition of adding trackers to emblems Ive decided to grind for 69,420 adding to my emblem and NEVER completing another triumph so long as I can help it:)

WRITING.TITLE: Is there a reason or lore related answer as to why stormcast prosecutors are different colours to the rest of them?

WRITING.TEXT: I noticed that on the website and in most pictures ive seen, the prosecutors with javelins were painted much darker instead of gold and wondered if there was a reason
Great, thanks #128513; im painting my own stormhosts and wondered why those tougher guys looked different so i could make my own look different but still fit my chosen colour scheme

Just saying I've read rumours that Bungo wanna transform Destiny 2 into a WoW like mmo with a divided player base, a good side and a bad side, Light and Darkness. If in this event, or something even more similar to choosing between Drifter or Vanguard, I'm choosing Darkness

Id love to see the players choices and actions influence the ultimate end of destiny on a large scale. Like if dark does outnumber the light then the dark wins. Or if its evenly matched, they do a live count of crucible victories or something along those lines and the winning side wins destiny
Whats aggro

I got 10 kills and the objective disappeared from the board in the arena, assuming id done it. But after completing that level the door still looks there same. Is there supposed to be some kind of marker or has the game not registered that i completed the objective?

WRITING.TITLE: Wildwood Rangers and Eternal Gaurd box
WRITING.TEXT: I've noticed that the Wildwood Rangers and the Eternal Guard are the same box. I'm planning a Sylvaneth/ Wood elf kinda army and was curious is theres anything against building an Eternal Guard unit with the Rangers hood instead of the helmets? As long as I make it clear at the start of a game who they are, there shouldn't be a problem, right?
I was thinking that, I was just unsure and wanted to check before I made a mistake that's all
I dont want them to cheat but they paid for the app and keeps flexing
Sure but that wont stop them cheating and I dont want them to get banned as were close to 4 star friendship

WRITING.TITLE: What's the deal with the Scarlet Keep
WRITING.TEXT: I loved shadowkeep as an expansion and the keep itself, I find it so interesting but I have so many questions about it, mostly lore that I either haven't found, simply overlooked/missed or even forgot (I played the story a year ago and have the memory span of a potato) Firstly, why was it built? What purpose does it serve? Secondly, why did the vanguard "monitor" its construction? Why didn't we do something about it. Thirdly, who oversaw its construction? Was it Savathun or Hashladun? Someone else entirely? 4th, how does the keeps construction fit in the lunar pyramid? I love the keep, and felt like it was left mostly unexplored. I could be wrong but we got a strike, and a dungeon but I really feel like something like the scarlet keep couldve made a nice kings fall style raid. In both the strike and the dungeon I found several doors that wouldnt open, so that tells me definitely that theres unexplored parts of the keep. I know bungie puts random doors in places (not the black clouded ad spawning doorways) but actual doors that do nothing. The curiosity in me cant help but wonder whats on the other side
Hashladun is a synonym for Hashnudal and if you've watched The Big Lez then you know "Aaahhh Hash-nu-dal"

WRITING.TITLE: Whats the deal with the Scarlet Keep
WRITING.TEXT: I loved shadowkeep as an expansion and the keep itself, I find it so interesting but I have so many questions about it, mostly lore that I either haven't found, simply overlooked/missed or even forgot (I played the story a year ago and have the memory span of a potato)I know it was built by Hashladun to harness the pyramids power, thanks to another destiny sub. Firstly, why did the vanguard "monitor" its construction? Why didn't we do something about it. I love the keep, and felt like it was left mostly unexplored. I could be wrong but we got a strike, and a dungeon but I really feel like something like the scarlet keep couldve made a nice kings fall style raid. In both the strike and the dungeon I found several doors that wouldnt open, so that tells me definitely that theres unexplored parts of the keep. I know bungie puts random doors in places (not the black clouded ad spawning doorways) but actual doors that do nothing. The curiosity in me cant help but wonder whats on the other side

WRITING.TITLE: Dark elves of AoS
WRITING.TEXT: I always remember Dark Elves being one of the "bad guy" armies but after browsing the store I see they're now part of the Order alliance. Are they no longer evil or did they decide to switch sides, does someone know the lore as to why?

Idk much lore behind order factions, what you say about their being multiple evil factions is interesting. Which others are considered evil? I'm new to AoS but played the Age of reckoning mmo so always viewed order as the good guys

That's interesting stuff I never knew any of that, i checked out the idoneth deepkin and considered them as an army, interesting models but "sea elves" isnt my thing, wouldn't have thought of them to be evil though. I'm especially surprised about that bit about the stormcast too

WRITING.TITLE: Returning player
WRITING.TEXT: I'm so happy theres a sub for this game... I'm a returning player, again #128514; I played the original age of reckoning, played Return of a couple years ago but I'm trying to get back into it. My main is Chosen, level 34. I'm trying to get the ruin set, if anyone is interested in helping. After ruin I'll be doing beastlord also
That's great to know, do you know the name of this pq? I'm assuming itll be the "easy one". Also in my time away I seem to have forgotten where the Ruin merchant is, could you help?

I found the pq, easy enough run, got a lesser bag with only a couple tokens...this will be a long grind #128514; Does pq difficulty affect the type of bag you get? I did Lorendaal solo but it was only a lesser bag, expecting something better as I obviously had such a high contribution

WRITING.TITLE: TWWH 1 OR TWWH 2
WRITING.TEXT: I'm gonna get either total war wahammer 1 or 2, I'm unsure which. Which is the better game? What are the factions like in either game? Are they the same, different, or does TWWH2 have the same factions with some additions?
Would you not consider the traveller awakening and literally vaporizing gaul as help?

WRITING.TITLE: Do you trust ol' Drifter?
WRITING.TEXT: Not really lore, but a discussion, one of my favourite questions to ask my friends. Do you trust the drifter? In his quest, I did side with him. He is a very mysterious and interesting man, very smart and all round badass. I do think he is up to something, hes very sketchy, as I'm sure some of you have heard in his "drug deal" phone call from the contact event, that made something tick in my mind. Although he is very mysterious, and as much as I know hes doing something very sketchy, i like to think he has my trust, and i have his. Maybe hes waiting for the right time to reveal what his purpose is. I'd hate the idea of him backstabbing us, but if he does I also like to think wed kill him, or wed end up on his list of people gunning for him at least. Do you trust him? Why? Do you not trust him? Why?

In lightfall, I have this idea that destiny 2 will end the same way it began, we lose the light, a reprised version of this song plays, only this time we dont come back like we did at the beginning. Its over. Ghosts little "eye light" goes out and he drops to ground and breaks. Our guardian weak, falls to their knees, and reaches out to the husk that was Ghost. They look around and see fellow ghosts and guardians on the ground. They look up and see the looming darkness, the pyramid(s?) Swarming the dying or already dead, faded traveler. We see a shadow grow over the field of dead ghosts and dying guardians. Our guardian slumps to the ground as the shadow covers them. The soundtrack reaches its climax and the screen goes black. "Destiny 2- Lightfall" appears on screen. Credits roll.
